transcript:
Customer: Pata nahi yaar kahan pe koi ho raha hai kaam karne ke liye yaar.

Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Ha hello.
Executive: Yeah hi ma'am.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello yeah hi ma'am good evening.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ma'am is my voice clear?
Customer: Yeah yeah.
Executive: Yeah actually ma'am I'm calling you from IndiaMART head office. Is it the right time to talk?
Customer: Ha yeah. You can talk.
Executive: Ma'am actually yesterday you were calling me and I just missed your call. Is there any concern?
Customer: Which product you want?
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Are you calling for enquiry? This is the speciality.
Executive: No no ma'am I am Tanu your account manager from IndiaMART. I'm saying yesterday you called me and I just missed your call. So is there any concern?
Customer: Did you call yesterday?
Executive: I'm saying ma'am you called me and I just missed your call yesterday. So is there any concern? Is there any issue you are facing in the IndiaMART?
Customer: No no no.
Executive: No issues?
Customer: No.
Executive: So actually ma'am your ticket got raised so can I just close that concern?
Customer: I think it's a call from IndiaMART for enquiry. Sorry.
Executive: No no ma'am this call is not regarding your enquiry. I am your account manager. So yesterday I just missed your call so right right now can I close your concern?
Customer: Okay I want to talk to my manager and I will call you next.
Executive: I am your account manager only. Ma'am you can call me on this number whenever you want. But for the meanwhile can I just close it?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: I will call you later.
Executive: Ma'am you can call me. I can just I will just drop you a message on WhatsApp as well. You can just call me on or you can just call me or drop me a text on WhatsApp also. So for meanwhile the concern can I close?

Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to know the customer's concern.

- Customer thinks it is an enquiry call.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified she is the account manager.

- Executive offered to drop a message on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer will call later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- enquiry, account manager, follow up
